subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Assists are not an official statistic in the Gold Cup, but Landon Donovan set up three goals in a dazzling performance in a victory over El Salvador.
snippet: Assists are not an official statistic in the Gold Cup, but Landon Donovan set up three goals in a dazzling performance in a victory over El Salvador.
